mapper.select: select dm.dinning_menu_type, dinning_menu_main, dinning_menu_sub, dinning_adult_price, dinning_kid_price from dinning_menu dm, dinning_price dp where dm.dinning_menu_type=dp.dinning_menu_type
select dining_schedule_num, dinning_type, dinning_detail_time from dinning_time_schedule where dinning_type=#{type} order by dinning_detail_time
